title: [Self-Directed] Effective Elementary Language Education Design in Blended Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and practical experience in elementary education
context.additional_context: A course focused on smartphone-based blended learning operations for in-service elementary teachers, emphasizing efficient integration of digital resources in offline classroom settings.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the MAC-ICE framework (Motivation, Ability, Circumstancesâ€“Interaction, Curriculum, Environment) for designing blended (online-offline) instruction.
Learners can implement at least three practical strategies to promote interaction in smartphone-based learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
